== UbuconAsia 2021 Virtual ==
<nowiki>[[File:ubuCon_logo_or.png | Logo | width=600]]</nowiki>

Ubucon Asia is a community event organized by Ubuntu LoCo teams in Asia region.
First UbuconAsia will be virtual conference and it will held at September 25th ~ 26th.
